original_text: but let man and beast be covered with sackcloth, and let them call out mightily to God. Let everyone turn from his evil way and from the violence that is in his hands.
korean_text: 사람이든지 짐승이든지 다 굵은 베 옷을 입을 것이요 힘써 하나님께 부르짖을 것이며 각기 악한 길과 손으로 행한 강포에서 떠날 것이라

sentences.original_text: but let man and beast be covered with sackcloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람과 짐승이 굵은 베옷을 입게 하고

sentences.original_text: and let them call out mightily to God.
Let everyone turn from his evil way
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 각각의 악한 길에서 돌이키고

sentences.original_text: and from the violence that is in his hands.
